item.title: Writing in Target Language Everyday and Writescribir
item.description: TL;DR: I think that writing in your target language everyday is a great way to improve your writing skills! So much so that I’m working on an app to help with that. Check it out at writescribir.com. Writing Everyday + Writescribir I think that writing in your target language everyday is a great way to improve and to keep your new language on your mind, especially when you don’t live in a country where your target language is spoken (or primarily spoken).
